recommendations: Will Wilson
"Passionate about empowering companies to adapt to technology transformation."​
December 11, 2016, Will reported directly to Aristides (A.Z.)

AZ is a hard working leader who is deeply engaged in the development of his team.  He is professional and extremely dedicated to helping others achieve their goals. He is one of those rare individuals you run across in your career that knows how to impact people through inspiration, motivation, and coaching. He excels in his ability to move a group towards a specified goal using a consultative leadership style, and he creates a powerful synergy within a sales organization. AZ keeps an open mind and is an advocate for collaboration within sales teams/organizations.  He finds ways to grow business with the existing customer base as well as with new business. Any sales organization would benefit from his mindset and the skill sets he will bring to their organization.

Will Wilson

December 9, 2016, Aristides (A.Z.) managed Will directly

Will is one of the best sales and business thinkers I've ever met.  He has a knack for helping organizations thrive through various types of contributions.  Whether it be leading teammates through changes, initiatives, optimization of work effectiveness, or creating imaginitive ways to improve the business around him; Will has the ability to greatly contribute.  In the process, he's able to make himself and those around him better.  I take great pleasure in sharing that Will was the person that taught me how to sell, as he was my very first sales leader.  And even still, he's being helpful in my (and many other's) careers to this day.  I would say that Will is a phenomenal asset to any organization he's with, and they are lucky to have him.

summary: I’m an encouraging leader passionate about assisting in the combined success of organizations and the businesses they serve. I greatly value creativity, diversity, building winning cultures, and win-win relationships.  I’ve inspired team transformations to lead to significant increased sales performance.  I have hired, trained, and developed recognized top sales talent and teams.  I’ve sponsored the establishment of plans, processes, and strategies for initiating new and innovative sales organizations.  I thrive to inspire and uplift those around me while I garner virtues from them.  I have been fortunate enough to manage small and large sales teams (from 3-41), and mange budgets of $650K-78M.  I’m completely enthralled by music, and study all types of elements of it when time permits.  And, I enjoy bringing that same level of passion and enjoyment with me in my career wherever I go.
name: Aristides (A.Z.) Zabala
title: Direct Sales Manager, Sage Mid-Market Solutions at Sage "Leading and Energizing Teams to Succeed and Serve SMB's"
